page.title: 12Social Survey (Transport)
page.content: All families in the survey sample have access to at least one car, and other forms of transport, in the following proportions: One car {49%} Two cars {49% } Three cars {2% } Bicycles { 82% } Caravans { 15% } Camping trailers { 5% {33%}of car users have access to a company car. {Public Transport} The cut-backs in the National Rural Bus Service left the area without a public transport service, but a privately run mini-bus now operates regularly on the main route to Chippenham. The nearest main-line railway station is in Chippenham.
